headline: MycoWorks partners with luxury brand for Reishi application.
summary: MycoWorks collaborates with a luxury brand to integrate its Reishi mushroom leather alternative into high-end products.

headline: Modern Meadow unveils Bio-Alloy leather alternative.
summary: Modern Meadow launches a new biofabricated material, Bio-Alloy, positioned as a leather and plastic substitute.

headline: Remilk partners with major food manufacturer.
summary: Remilk announces a strategic partnership with a leading food company to integrate its animal-free dairy products.

headline: Change Foods secures funding for precision-fermented dairy.
summary: Change Foods receives investment to scale up its animal-free dairy production using precision fermentation.

headline: Algiknit raises Series A for seaweed-based yarns.
summary: Algiknit secures Series A funding to scale the production of its sustainable yarns derived from seaweed.

headline: The Every Co. launches egg white protein in food service.
summary: The Every Company expands its precision fermentation egg white protein into the food service sector.
